publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2548# Dennis Canavan: McCowan’s of Stenhousemuir in Receivership—That the Parliament is concerned that McCowan’s of Stenhousemuir has gone into receivership with the resultant threat to over 80 jobs; recognises the quality of the workforce who have helped to make McCowan’s a leading name in the Scottish confectionery industry, and considers that the Scottish Executive and Scottish Enterprise Forth Valley should offer every possible assistance to ensure the continuation of the company’s production at Stenhousemuir with the retention of as many jobs as possible. Supported by: Mary Scanlon*, Mike Watson*, Mike Pringle*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Michael Matheson*, Rob Gibson*

S2M-2548 #McCowan’s of Stenhousemuir in Receivership (lodged on 8 March 2005) Donald Gorrie*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Tricia Marwick*, Jackie Baillie*, Alex Neil*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Brian Adam*, Elaine Smith*, Cathy Peattie*, Cathie Craigie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Karen Gillon*, Campbell Martin*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr John Swinney*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Janis Hughes*
S2M-2548# McCowan’s of Stenhousemuir in Receivership (lodged on 8 March 2005) Mr Bruce McFee*, John Swinburne*, Dr Jean Turner*, Margaret Mitchell*

S2M-2548 # Dennis Canavan:McCowan’s of Stenhousemuir in Receivership—That the Parliament is concerned that McCowan’s of Stenhousemuir has gone into receivership with the resultant threat to over 80 jobs; recognises the quality of the workforce who have helped to make McCowan’s a leading name in the Scottish confectionery industry, and considers that the Scottish Executive and Scottish Enterprise Forth Valley should offer every possible assistance to ensure the continuation of the company’s production at Stenhousemuir with the retention of as many jobs as possible. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Mike Watson, Mike Pringle, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Fergus Ewing, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Michael Matheson, Rob Gibson, Donald Gorrie, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Tricia Marwick, Jackie Baillie, Alex Neil, Roseanna Cunningham, Brian Adam, Elaine Smith, Cathy Peattie, Cathie Craigie, Nora Radcliffe, Karen Gillon, Campbell Martin, Ms Sandra White, Mr John Swinney, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr Frank McAveety, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Janis Hughes, Mr Bruce McFee, John Swinburne, Dr Jean Turner, Margaret Mitchell, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-2548# McCowan’s of Stenhousemuir in Receivership (lodged on 8 March 2005) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-2548# McCowan’s of Stenhousemuir in Receivership (lodged on 8 March 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2548 #McCowan’s of Stenhousemuir in Receivership (lodged on 8 March 2005) Marilyn Livingstone*
S2M-2548 #McCowan’s of Stenhousemuir in Receivership (lodged on 8 March 2005) Mark Ballard*, Pauline McNeill*
